heading: HB00385
0: AN ACT SEPARATING RIZAL NATIONAL SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADES-SANTOR EXTENSION IN BARANGAY SANTOR, MUNICIPALITY OF RIZAL, PROVINCE OF KALINGA FROM RIZAL NATIONAL SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADES, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS SANTOR NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00385
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING RIZAL NATIONAL SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADES-SANTOR EXTENSION IN BARANGAY SANTOR, MUNICIPALITY OF RIZAL, PROVINCE OF KALINGA FROM RIZAL NATIONAL SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADES, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS SANTOR NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MANGAOANG, ALLEN JESSE C.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 03-14-2017
      2. Approved by the Committee on 03-14-2017
      3. Committee Report Approved on 03-14-2017
      4. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-24
          -DepED
      5. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-04-06
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
      7. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
          -Approved pursuant to Section 44 of the Rules of the House of Representatives, 17th Congress, without amendment.
